rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: The entrance hall is designed to welcome visitors and includes a Vastu-aligned placement for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living room with Mediterranean influences, abundant natural light from East-facing windows (adhering to Vastu principles) and a view of the garden.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: The kitchen is designed with modern amenities while retaining Mediterranean stylistic elements. Open concept layout for connectivity with dining area.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom is situated in the north-east corner to promote positive energy according to Vastu principles. It features a balcony and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room located near the master bedroom, ensuring privacy while following Mediterranean design themes.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: An exclusive space dedicated to entertainment; features soundproofing and acoustic treatments. Aligned with West-facing orientation for ambient evening light and Vastu compatibility.

openings.description: Main entrance located on the north side to ensure a calm and welcoming environment per Vastu.
